attributes.additional_details:
The Tyne & Wear Metro is just far too expensive for the service and quality you get.

This causing more and more people to "skip" it.

Not all people can afford to pay, so why would they put themselves out for something that constantly stinks with no customer service when you need it?

Make it cheaper, and more people will actually be able to afford to use it and maybe even respect it a bit more!

rejection.details: This is a local issue for the Tyne and Wear Integrated Transport Authority
